1 -   -    -   .      ,    .       "  ,       ( -     )       :    (Assignment) var_name <- value     , R     ,   .    (    ),     .    ,  . var1 <- 2 # initial assignment print(var1) ## [1] 2 # we can change the value and the type of a variable var1 <- 'different value!' print(var1) ## [1] "different value!" print(var2) # not exist ## Error in print(var2): object 'var2' not found 1.1 character      (, , ).   .        character: text_var <- "this is a character!" class(text_var) ## [1] "character" text_var2 <- 'this is also a character!' # mixing single quotes and double quotes to implement # quotes into the character text_var3 <- "it's still a character!" text_var4 <- 'Mark Twain said: "I am an old man and have known a great many troubles, but most of them never happened."' 1.2 numeric    ,     . : numeric_var <- 14.6 class(numeric_var) ## [1] "numeric" numeric_var2 <- 13 :         -R   -numeric. 1.3 logical     TRUE    FALSE. FALSE  FALSE ( ), R    character. : logical_var <- FALSE print(logical_var) ## [1] FALSE class(logical_var) ## [1] "logical" logical_var2 <- (1 == 1) # returns TRUE print(logical_var2) ## [1] TRUE class(logical_var2) ## [1] "logical"
